page.title: 03Renhold - housing
page.content:
One feature of Renhold, although certainly not a unique feature, is the number of modernised cottages.
Planning regulations prohibit the wholesale demolition of the traditional cottages and their replacement by new housing. Instead, there has been a movement to retain their essential character externally whilst the interior is completely modernised. Extensions for bathrooms and kitchens must blend in and a number of builders and developers in the county specialise in these 'character cottages.'
The success or otherwise of these conversions is very much a matter of individual taste!
